channel.title: Eichenseer K on Earth System Evolution
channel.description: Recent content in Eichenseer K on Earth System Evolution

item.title: Jurassic shift from abiotic to biotic control on marine ecological success
item.description: Secular changes of ocean chemistry and temperature governs the ecological success of aragonitic calcifiers from the Ordovician to the Middle Jurassic, but not thereafter. This regime shift coincides with the proliferation of calcareous plankton in the mid-Mesozoic.
